info.info1: Currently I'm working a web developer and team leader at Liana Technologies. I have been working for over ten years with web development. My job is a technical and organized but then creative proplem solving and communication between the different parties. Of this combination I like most in my work.
info.info2: As a counterweight to technology, I use my free time to help elderly people and to hanging around in nature. I also engage in any kind of crafts from restoration to cooking.
info.info3: You can learn anything, as long as you possess passion, motivation, and good teacher.
